ComicInfo.Title: The Dentist from Sheboygan; Sax Leftfield; The Life and Times of Harry Smuggens; Tantric Tanturm; Cocaine Capers; I Dreamt I Was a Character in Underground Heaven; Hot Squash in San Jose
ComicInfo.Summary:
The doctor who drugs and rapes his female patients is caught and found guilty.
A man goes into an apartment and injects himself with a drug.
Blackwall and Siegel move to a bad part of town to lie low for a while even as Blackwall resumes his bootleg drug making.
Meeting strange individuals on the bus.
Harry's wide-raging life story from birth to death to being revived in the far future.
Cacaraj joins Smartology in this sendup of cult-like belief systems.
Melinda dreams she's at a party at Trina's place with many underground comix luminaries as a nuclear apocalypse approaches.
An offer to buy some "hot" i.e. stolen squash.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-19 15:23:32. [CVDB185377] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 17:11:49. [Issue ID 277042]
